main event: A witness observed a bright, metallic-looking object hovering a few feet above the ground along a road in Scotland.
interesting points: The object was shaped like a plate and gleamed in the sunlight.
The object appeared to rotate slowly.
The object suddenly shot upwards at an unbelievable speed and disappeared from sight.
The witnesses could hardly believe what they had seen.
The incident was reported to the local police, who considered it worth investigating but did not take any official action.
